## Port.attachUI() method

Connect an iframe element which is displaying another page in the extension with the extension's bootstrap frame, so they can share context and events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
attachUI(iframe: HTMLIFrameElement): Promise<Phantogram<unknown>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  iframe | HTMLIFrameElement |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Phantogram&lt;unknown&gt;&gt;
